QuestData.Title: Daggers of the Great Ones
QuestData.Description: That recipe said: "rending daggers of the great ones"...$b$b<Olon ponders this line.>$b$bMushan! That's it!$b$bThere's plenty of mushan roaming out there with these great, big teeth... they're as long as daggers. That's gotta be what the recipe calls for.
QuestData.CompletionText: I wonder how we'll mix those things into the brew? Can't grind them up - that'd be too gritty.$b$bMaybe I'll just soak 'em for a while.
QuestData.RewardText: I never thought of putting mushan teeth in a brew before.$b$bThat scroll's got some wacky ideas.
